metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28330 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient sanitizing in backup resulted in an arbitrary file read risk. The capability to access this feature is only available to teachers, managers and admins by default.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
